data.name: bullets
data.detailed_description: Experience the coolest online battle game in the world. Engage in an intense war on terror and face off against notorious terrorists. Team up and work together to accomplish impossible tasks with your teammates. Charge into battle, siege the city. Rescue the hostages. The success of the team is inseparable from your achievements. Team success will witness your exploits.
data.about_the_game: Experience the coolest online battle game in the world. Engage in an intense war on terror and face off against notorious terrorists. Team up and work together to accomplish impossible tasks with your teammates. Charge into battle, siege the city. Rescue the hostages. The success of the team is inseparable from your achievements. Team success will witness your exploits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10X64
  • Processor: i5-8400
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
